\documentclass[12pt,letterpaper]{article}

\usepackage{amsmath}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\newcommand{\digitbox}{%
  \fbox{
  \rule[-1.5ex]{0pt}{4ex}
  \hspace{2ex}}}

\newcommand{\bigdigitbox}{%
  \fbox{
  \rule[-2ex]{0pt}{5ex}
  \hspace{3ex}}}


\begin{document}



\centerline{%
  \begin{tabular}{lll}
    Q.\#  &
    Test \#  &
    Student \#  \\
    \fbox{\digitbox\,\digitbox}
    \qquad\qquad &
    \fbox{\digitbox\,\digitbox\,\digitbox\,\digitbox}
    \qquad\qquad &
    \fbox{\digitbox\,\digitbox\,\digitbox\,\digitbox\,%
      \digitbox\,\digitbox\,\digitbox\,\digitbox}
  \end{tabular}
}


\begin{center}
  \textbf{Only 1 question per page! If you need more space, use back or another sheet.}
\end{center}

\hrule

\vfill

\hrule
